alert.note: Alert for Barren (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 11 at 6:44PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Barren County through 615 PM CDT... At 544 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles southwest of Glasgow, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of central Barren County, including the following locations... Eighty Eight, Bristletown, Red Cross, Pritchardsville, Lucas, Lecta, Haywood, Austin, Nobob and Beckton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for south central Kentucky.
